News.headline: Tickets ON SALE: Dagenham and Redbridge v Eastleigh FC
News.page_title: Tickets ON SALE: Dagenham and Redbridge v Eastleigh FC
News.URL_keywords: Tickets ON SALE: Dagenham and Redbridge v Eastleigh FC
News.short_description: Tickets for the Daggers home clash against Eastleigh FC are now on sale
News.description:
Eastleigh FC visit The Chigwell Construction Stadium on Saturday 1st April, with a 3:00pm kick off. 

Ticket prices can be found here. Under-10s are FREE if purchased in advance of matchday with an adult equivalent.  

Please note that the AGP Steel Family Stand is not on sale for home fans for this game, full information can be found here.

Individual tickets can also be purchased on-line, on the phone and in the club shop.  

Purchase:
Online:www.daggerstickets.co.uk
Phone: 020 8592 1549 ext 21    
Club shop: Opening Times
